import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; function Auth() { const [bookList, setBookList] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/books').then((allBooks) => { setBookList(allBooks.data.filter((book) => book.status === 'Lu')); }); }, []); const coverList = bookList.map((book) => book.cover); console.log(coverList); return (
